eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Colorado; AT 10:40 AM ON NOV 25, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:40 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the monthly test of the Emergency Alert System from the Colorado Division of Homeland Security and Emergency Management. Had this been an actual emergency, you would have been given important information concerning the emergency. This concludes our monthly test of the Emergency Alert System.
